Dear Mr Jacob,
Your email is well received. Thank you for the compliment. It is
appreciated. I will briefly explain the purchasing and list the documents
that will be provided by the government  to cover your gold purchase.
The CIF is Cost Insurance and Freight of the product.
The SPA is the Sales Purchase Agreement .This document contains and
explains the terms of  sales and purchase shipment and delivery.
The following documents are to be issued and this are the document that
will move with your gold. They are the only cost and fees associated with
the purchase.
GOVERNMENT TAX RECEIPT = this is calculated with the quantity of
gold bought 7.5% to 10% tax will be paid.
ANALYSIS REPORT
CERTIFICATE OF ORIGIN
CERTIFICATE OF OWNERSHIP
EXPORT PERMIT
COMMERCIAL INVOICE.
Note only the government taxes do change according to amount of gold. The
rest of the documents are fixed just small fees.
I can send you the SPA document when you have shown willingness to make a
gold purchase. This document will be filled, signed and counter signed by
both buyer and seller. This is a draft of the process in most cases we
discuss and reach an agreement that is agreeable to both parties. The
seller will be responsible for providing the travel visa.
I want to establish a genuine and honest relationship with you. Let me know
what your intentions are. Are you ready to buy and in what quantity ?  What
is your location ?  Are you an individual or a company ?
I look forward to hearing from you soon.
Best  Regards.
Engr. Patrick Yaw

Your email is well received. Thank you for the compliment. It is
appreciated. I will briefly explain the purchasing and list the documents
that will be provided by the government  to cover your gold purchase.
The CIF is Cost Insurance and Freight of the product.
The SPA is the Sales Purchase Agreement .This document contains and
explains the terms of  sales and purchase shipment and delivery.
The following documents are to be issued and this are the document that
will move with your gold. They are the only cost and fees associated with
the purchase.
GOVERNMENT TAX RECEIPT = this is calculated with the quantity of
gold bought 7.5% to 10% tax will be paid.
ANALYSIS REPORT
CERTIFICATE OF ORIGIN
CERTIFICATE OF OWNERSHIP
EXPORT PERMIT
COMMERCIAL INVOICE.
Note only the government taxes do change according to amount of gold. The
rest of the documents are fixed just small fees.
I can send you the SPA document when you have shown willingness to make a
gold purchase. This document will be filled, signed and counter signed by
both buyer and seller. This is a draft of the process in most cases we
discuss and reach an agreement that is agreeable to both parties. The
seller will be responsible for providing the travel visa.
I want to establish a genuine and honest relationship with you. Let me know
what your intentions are. Are you ready to buy and in what quantity ?  What
is your location ?  Are you an individual or a company ?
I look forward to hearing from you soon.
Best  Regards.
Engr. Patrick Yaw
